name: Staley Capital Advisors
overview:
The Staley Capital team has developed and executed a highly successful investment strategy that matches diverse private investment and operating skills to its investment focus.

Renny Smith has invested nearly $500MM of capital with approximately a 3x return multiple. Renny was a partner at Thomas H. Lee Partners for a decade and in 1999 Co-Founded TH Lee Putnam Ventures (â€œTHLPVâ€).

Amit Basak brings a combination of private equity and deep sales, marketing and general management experience as an executive in business services companies. Until March 2008, Amit served as Interim COO and CFO Affinity Express, a business process outsourcer of graphics production services. Prior to Affinity Express, he was General Manager at ClickSquared a multi-channel, outsourced direct marketing services firm and the fastest growing private company in New England in 2005. Amit joined after a THLPV-led recapitalization of the business and led the sales, implementation and growth of multi-million dollar, recurring relationships with Fortune 100 clients in new industry verticals.

Staley Capital has one Special Partner, Ramanan Raghavendran, and three Senior Advisors, Bernie Andrews, Alfredo “Fred” Ayala and Phillip Riese. These individuals bring deep domain and functional expertise developed over decades as senior executives in their respective industries, proven abilities to create value as executives, investors and board members, a genuine interest and passion for advising management teams and long histories of working with the Staley Capital team. Ramanan is a Managing Partner at Kubera Partners and a Senior Partner at THLPV. Bernie is a former COO of Montgomery Ward and EVP of Operations and Marketing at Circuit City. Phillip spent 18 years in a variety of roles at American Express and ultimately served as President of the Consumer Card Group. Fred is the former CEO and Chairman of eTelecare, a leader in outsourcing and offshoring for call center operations.
